_header: Of the Psalter in English here is the ginning
_description: Couplet introducing a Middle English prose translation of the Psalter

CamMagPep2498.Transcription:
Of þe sautere on englisch here is þe gynnyngeWiþ
                    þe latyn bifore & Gregories expounynge
CamMagPep2498.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             Bibliotheca Pepysiana: A Descriptive Catalogue of the Library of Samuel
                Pepys. Pt. III: Medieval Manuscripts.
         London, 1923: 3.107.
Påhlsson,  Joel,
                        ed.  
             The Recluse: a Fourteenth Century Version of the Ancren Riwle.
         Lund: Ohlsson, 1911: iv.
